title: @riot Anivia Bug or working as Intended?
body: Question for any rioter or anyone who might know this answer. I just had a match as Anivia and I noticed that any form of movement CC (knock up/knock back) canceled her ult. Her ult isn't a channel, though. So, is this intended or a bug on her part? I'm thinking it has something to do with her passive if it isn't a bug, but I'm not sure.

replies.body: Anivia's ultimate automatically cancels if she exits range, reactivates her ultimate, runs out of mana, or is hit by any CC that would normally cancel channels.
